price: Uko ni na ko tweretse Aburahamu ubwami bw’ibirere n’ubw’isi, kugira ngo abe mu bizera badashidikanya.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُرِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ مَلَكُوتَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلِيَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُوقِنِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nurī ib'rāhīma malakūta al-samāwāti wal-arḍi waliyakūna mina al-mūqinīna
